message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $9,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I would like to propose a price of $9,000. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $9,250? I believe that's a fair price that reflects the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $9,100. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
